descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
**The Tavern of Lost Souls is Now Open**

Experience an intense and immersive dive into the watery underworld of pirate bartending!
[media]
**Protect your Booty**

Build out your tavern, raise your fortunes, strengthen your firepower! Lest we forget -- greed in this world can never be sated. 

[media]
**The Dreaded Debt Collector is Coming. Will you be Prepared?**

Down here, new management means nothing to those still collecting on the debt of your infamous, tomb-sunken father!
[media]

**The Tavern of Lost Souls is Now Open**

Experience an intense and immersive dive into the watery underworld of pirate bartending!
![{"height":640,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499619145_2277648666027610_6685137458776399597_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=s5rXUnPBbJIQ7kNvwHovZ3e&_nc_oc=AdmX3kIdwfvgaUt7Pl5N8nU-YIBmV0qw4nH0P9MhSS3eBO0u1o_gsAMA7iJwzP39bjw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=JRidXFzJJtZy80KI84g8WQ&oh=00_AfvDQ1CzBwFLnFdvFD-TUBkNQ2VXsLDy51MMypfZW_RrMw&oe=6995121D)
**Protect your Booty**

Build out your tavern, raise your fortunes, strengthen your firepower! Lest we forget -- greed in this world can never be sated. 

![{"height":640,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491827595_1865364267642362_1367380357141131817_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WQ1V-YqPi1cQ7kNvwHXtmhu&_nc_oc=AdkBSbm62qtPfGDJPzDp2JEWRrVZjMCXDuCZBQKVtAACW-30GfFZTBZrLV0NPXkvI4M&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=JRidXFzJJtZy80KI84g8WQ&oh=00_AfsCHh8SI5Oh-r54swxAovqYU1TrBtXrwkp_CY_Mx0wGyA&oe=69951D83)
**The Dreaded Debt Collector is Coming. Will you be Prepared?**

Down here, new management means nothing to those still collecting on the debt of your infamous, tomb-sunken father!
